description:
Catching the first runs on the bunny hill is so much better when your little shredder is nice and warm. Whether they’re enjoying groomed slopes or building epic snow forts on recess, the MerinoMIX Pro balaclava will keep your little one cozy.

  • Dual layer construction uses quick drying polyester with warm merino wool
  • Ergonomic design tucks comfortably under a helmet
  • Accu-Dri® wicking technology to keep you dry and warm
  • Merino wool is naturally antimicrobial
  • Kombi’s merino wool is certified mulesing-free
name: Kombi MerinoMix Pro Balaclava - Children to Youths
